2.caption_en: A strategic diagram centered on "Your Unfair Advantage." Seven surrounding elements—Market Access/Location, Intelligence & Insights, Network, Expertise, Status & Reputation, Infrastructure, and Capital—radiate from the center with icons and connecting spokes.
